item.title: Why is eval parse bad?
item.description: title: “Why is eval parse bad?” author: ’’ date: ‘2021-04-20’ slug: why-is-eval-parse-bad categories: [ ‘R’ ] tags: [‘tidyeval’, ‘arrow’] I was writing Arrow bindings for na.omit and needed a way of applying is.na to every column of a table at once. I’d originally implemented using dplyr::filter, but had failed to realise that Arrow only suggests dplyr but doesn’t import it, and so needed to refactor it.
